questions.quote: Listen, maybe we shouldn't start writing today. I got a lot on my mind.
Hey, boys and girls. I need you both to sponsor me in the AIDS walk.
Boy, it's a lucky thing I put the jacket on. But how did it get in the pocket?
Jerry? I have an announcement. Your grandmother is on the line.
George, George, instead of talking about this, we could be... you know...
THANKS FOR SHOWING UP. YOU KNOW YOUR FRIEND HERE TRIED TO KILL ME.
Ho ho ho Well come on little Princess, tell Santa what you want. Don't be shy.
What do you mean you don't like it? How could you not like it?
I can't believe it. You know better than to get involved with Kramer.
No games? What is the point of dating without games? How do you know if you're winning or losing?
